title: Chrono Review: JSON Store Audit

entries.rationale: Corrected eukaryotic definition: memory/ is a Subject for its logs and an Object for its leaf-passthrough (public/ or private/).
entries.user_reasons: memory/ is the GDrive layer; webm/ replaces big_files/; inbox/ is for unorganized files.

entries.rationale: Bootstrap artifact superseded by dedicated schema/ branch.
Collapsed deep fragmentation into a single schema. This adheres to Hierarchy Proportion principles.
entries.user_reasons: User recorded trepidations: fragmented files may help less capable models focus context, but agreed that for high-capability sessions, this leads to bloat.

entries.rationale: Moved to rules/ and updated "unclean" language to dynamic/stream/ standards.
entries.user_reasons: The image journal and memory/ repo were created as a workaround for the difficulty of cleaning streams in .chat/ (deprecated). This path led to the metagit as a self-reflective AL solution.

entries.rationale: Relocated to principles/ and expanded with swarm-specific traits.
entries.user_reasons: Add a WEDO to make it less generic and mention it beside glossary as helpful user info in startup.

entries.rationale: Autonomous cleanup of single-key fragments. Merged startup protocols, error handling, and knowledge base into logical group-files.
entries.user_reasons: Consolidate single key:value json with agent discretion.

entries.rationale: Moved to git_methodology/ and added recursive commit logic.
Merged root fragments into session_behavior/ branch.
Merged root chat_history and LIFO principle into session_behavior/. Corrected format to .txt and deprecated .chat/.
entries.user_reasons: Followed agent recommendation; confirmed log format is exclusively .txt.

entries.rationale: Collapsed hundreds of fragmented rules and principles into unified branch-files. This significantly reduces hierarchy bloat while preserving all legislative logic.
entries.user_reasons: Consolidate single key:value json with agent discretion.
